item.description:
THANK YOU all for your interest in this event, it is now officially SOLD OUT.  

Hope to see you all next year!

Cheers,

Michele

For similar adventures check out: www.desotoadventures.com

 

Join us for our 2nd Annual Kayak-a-thon (and 150th Anniversary of the building of the lighthouses in 1861) as we paddle from Granite Pier in Rockport to Thacher Island (aka Twin Lights) and back. This event will help raise funds for the Thacher Island Association (TIA). The TIA, a 501(c)(3) non-profit organization, was established in 1981 by the Thacher Island Town Committee (TITC) and is dedicated to the restoration and on-going maintenance of the island and it's buildings. Entry fee is $25, but you must raise at least $75 in donations to receive a gift bag (your entry fee counts towards your total sponsorship). Donated prizes will be given to the participants who raise the most money. For more details or to sign up for this event please go to: http://thacherislandpaddle.com/
item.name: Thacher Island Kayak-A-Thon
